parts.text:
{"word":"boom","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(雷・大砲などの)轟音、爆音","english_definition":"a loud, deep, resonant sound.","examples":[{"sentence":"We heard the boom of thunder in the distance.","translation":"遠くで雷の轟音が聞こえた。"},{"sentence":"The boom of the cannon echoed through the valley.","translation":"大砲の轟音が谷に響き渡った。"}],"collocations":["thunder boom (雷鳴)","cannon boom (大砲の轟音)","sonic boom (ソニックブーム)"],"synonyms":["roar","thunder","explosion","blast"],"antonyms":["whisper","silence"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(経済などの)急成長、好景気、活況","english_definition":"a period of great prosperity or rapid economic growth.","examples":[{"sentence":"The city experienced an economic boom in the 1990s.","translation":"その都市は1990年代に経済ブームを経験した。"},{"sentence":"The housing boom led to a rise in property prices.","translation":"住宅ブームは不動産価格の上昇につながった。"}],"collocations":["economic boom (経済ブーム)","housing boom (住宅ブーム)","population boom (人口増加)","baby boom (ベビーブーム)","technology boom (技術ブーム)"],"synonyms":["prosperity","growth","expansion","upswing","flourishing"],"antonyms":["recession","slump","depression","decline"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(マイクなどの)ブーム、(クレーンなどの)アーム","english_definition":"a long pole or beam used to hold a microphone, camera, or sail.","examples":[{"sentence":"The microphone was attached to a boom above the actors.","translation":"マイクは俳優たちの上のブームに取り付けられていた。"},{"sentence":"The crane's boom extended over the construction site.","translation":"クレーンのアームが建設現場に伸びていた。"}],"collocations":["microphone boom (マイクブーム)","camera boom (カメラブーム)","crane boom (クレーンブーム)","sail boom (セールブーム)"],"synonyms":["arm","pole","beam","spar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(雷・大砲などが)轟音を立てる、爆音を響かせる","english_definition":"to make a loud, deep, resonant sound.","examples":[{"sentence":"The thunder boomed overhead.","translation":"雷が頭上で轟いた。"},{"sentence":"The guns boomed in the distance.","translation":"遠くで銃が轟音を立てた。"}],"collocations":["thunder booming (雷が轟く)","cannon booming (大砲が轟く)"],"synonyms":["roar","thunder","resonate","echo"],"antonyms":["whisper","murmur"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(経済などが)急成長する、活況を呈する","english_definition":"to grow or increase rapidly; to prosper.","examples":[{"sentence":"The economy is booming.","translation":"経済は活況を呈している。"},{"sentence":"Business is booming for the new restaurant.","translation":"新しいレストランは商売繁盛している。"}],"collocations":["economy booming (経済が活況を呈する)","business booming (商売繁盛)","market booming (市場が活況を呈する)"],"synonyms":["flourish","thrive","prosper","expand","grow rapidly"],"antonyms":["decline","slump","recede","stagnate"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(宣伝などで)～を大いに売り込む、～を宣伝する","english_definition":"to promote or publicize something vigorously.","examples":[{"sentence":"The company is booming its new product.","translation":"その会社は新製品を大いに売り込んでいる。"}],"collocations":["boom a product (製品を売り込む)","boom a movie (映画を宣伝する)"],"synonyms":["promote","publicize","advertise","hype"],"antonyms":["downplay","suppress"]}],"etymology":{"value":"擬音語起源。中英語の「bomben」 (轟音を立てる) に由来し、さらに古い起源は不明。経済的な意味での「boom」は、1879年頃にアメリカ英語で初めて使われた。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/buːm/","syllables":"boom"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"booms","verb_forms":{"present_simple":["boom","booms"],"past_simple":"boomed","past_participle":"boomed","present_participle":"booming"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**boom**」は、大きな音を表す擬音語から派生した単語で、名詞としては「轟音」や「爆音」といった意味があります。また、経済やビジネスの分野では、「急成長」や「好景気」を表す言葉としてもよく使われます。さらに、特定の道具（マイク、クレーンなど）の「アーム」を指すこともあります。動詞としては、「轟音を立てる」という意味の他に、「経済などが急成長する」「（宣伝などで）～を大いに売り込む」という意味があります。文脈によって意味が大きく異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The economy is bomb.","correct":"✓ The economy is booming.","note":"経済が好調な状態を表すには、動詞の現在進行形「booming」を使うのが適切です。「bomb」は名詞で「爆弾」という意味なので、意味が全く異なります。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I heard a boom of the door.","correct":"✓ I heard the bang of the door.","note":"ドアが閉まる音には「bang」を使うのが一般的です。「boom」はより大きく、深い音に使われます。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["booming (形容詞: 活況を呈している、轟音を立てている)","boomer (名詞: ブームを経験した人、ベビーブーム世代)"],"phrasal_verbs":["boom out (大声で言う、響き渡る)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**boom**」は、大きな音や急な成長を表す単語です。雷や爆発のような大きな音を「boom」と言います。また、経済が急に良くなることを「economic boom（経済ブーム）」と言います。さらに、マイクやクレーンの長い腕のような部分も「boom」と呼びます。文脈によって意味が変わるので、注意して使いましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The **boom** of the explosion shook the windows.","translation":"爆発の轟音が窓を揺らした。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"轟音"},{"sentence":"The tech industry is currently experiencing a **boom**.","translation":"現在、テクノロジー業界はブームを経験している。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"好景気"},{"sentence":"The microphone was attached to a **boom**.","translation":"マイクはブームに取り付けられていた。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"アーム"},{"sentence":"The cannons **boomed** across the battlefield.","translation":"大砲が戦場に轟き渡った。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"轟音を立てる"},{"sentence":"The town's population **boomed** after the discovery of gold.","translation":"金の発見後、その町の人口は急増した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"急成長する"},{"sentence":"The company is **booming** its new line of clothing.","translation":"その会社は新しい衣料品ラインを大いに売り込んでいる。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"売り込む"}]}
}
